alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Putnam (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Montgomery and northwestern Putnam Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 647 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Crawfordsville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Montgomery and northwestern Putnam Counties, including the following locations... Waveland, Bainbridge, Carpentersville, New Market, Shades State Park, Russellville, Ladoga, Roachdale and Alamo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
